revised_title: Discovery of Osmium and its Properties
tldr: Smithson Tennant discovers a new metal, osmium, in the black powder remaining after the solution of platina. He describes its properties, including its strong smell, and its ability to form a deep vivid blue color when mixed with an infusion of galls. Osmium is found to be unique in that it cannot be separated from gold and platina using the usual refining processes.
